title: MINUS THE BEAR Adds Six Dates To Their Menos El Oso 20th Anniversary Tour
description: Including a third Seattle date. The post MINUS THE BEAR Adds Six Dates To Their Menos El Oso 20th Anniversary Tour appeared first on Metal Injection.
author: Greg Kennelty
byline: By Greg Kennelty Published 4 hours ago
text: The recently-reunited Minus The Bear will hit the road this October and November for a 20th anniversary tour around their Menos el Oso album. The tour now includes five new stops, which are: 10/16 Austin, TX Emos10/19 New Orleans, LA Civic Theatre11/4 Washington, DC 9:30 Club11/9 New York, NY Irving Plaza11/19 Lawrence, KS Granada Theatre11/26 Seattle, WA The Showbox Minus The Bear's full tour is as follows, including the new dates The tour kicks off on October 4 at the Roseland Theater in Portland, OR and wraps up with two shows on November 28 and 29 at The Showbox in Seattle, WA. Tickets are available here. "'Menos el Oso put us on a trajectory that none of us were expecting," wrote Minus The Bear of the trek and the album. "There is a 'before 'Pachuca Sunrise' video' moment in time, and then there is an 'after 'Pachuca Sunrise' video' moment in time. It seemed like once people heard that song, and saw that video, everyone went straight to Limewire, Napster, Soulseek, BitTorrent, etc. and shared the album immediately. "Celebrating the twentieth anniversary of something this monumental in our lives is a gift. Having the chance to appreciate it with our fans, families and fellow bandmates while we are all alive and kicking is an opportunity I can’t wait to embrace." 10/4 Portland, OR Roseland Theater10/6 Sacramento, CA Ace of Spades10/7 San Francisco, CA Regency Ballroom10/8 San Diego, CA The Observatory North Park10/10 Las Vegas, NV Best Friends Forever Festival10/11 Los Angeles, CA The Belasco10/12 Los Angeles, CA The Belasco10/14 Tempe, AZ Marquee Theatre10/16 Austin, TX Emos10/17 Dallas, TX Granada Theater10/18 Austin, TX Emo’s Austin10/19 New Orleans, LA Civic Theatre10/21 Orlando, FL The Beacham10/22 Atlanta, GA Masquerade10/24 Philadelphia, PA The Fillmore10/25 Boston, MA House of Blues11/4 Washington, DC 9:30 Club11/5 Washington, D.C. 9:30 Club11/7 Brooklyn, NY Brooklyn Steel11/8 New York, NY Irving Plaza11/9 New York, NY Irving Plaza11/11 Pittsburgh, PA Roxian Theatre11/12 Cleveland, OH House of Blues11/14 Detroit, MI Majestic Theatre11/15 Chicago, IL Metro11/16 Chicago, IL Metro11/18 Minneapolis, MN First Avenue11/19 Lawrence, KS Granada Theatre11/21 Denver, CO Ogden Theatre11/22 Denver, CO Ogden Theatre11/23 Salt Lake City, UT The Depot11/26 Seattle, WA The Showbox11/28 Seattle, WA The Showbox11/29 Seattle, WA The Showbox Want More Metal? html:
The recently-reunited Minus The Bear will hit the road this October and November for a 20th anniversary tour around their Menos el Oso album. The tour now includes five new stops, which are:

10/16 Austin, TX Emos
10/19 New Orleans, LA Civic Theatre
11/4 Washington, DC 9:30 Club
11/9 New York, NY Irving Plaza
11/19 Lawrence, KS Granada Theatre
11/26 Seattle, WA The Showbox

Minus The Bear's full tour is as follows, including the new dates The tour kicks off on October 4 at the Roseland Theater in Portland, OR and wraps up with two shows on November 28 and 29 at The Showbox in Seattle, WA. Tickets are available here.

"'Menos el Oso put us on a trajectory that none of us were expecting," wrote Minus The Bear of the trek and the album. "There is a 'before 'Pachuca Sunrise' video' moment in time, and then there is an 'after 'Pachuca Sunrise' video' moment in time. It seemed like once people heard that song, and saw that video, everyone went straight to Limewire, Napster, Soulseek, BitTorrent, etc. and shared the album immediately.

"Celebrating the twentieth anniversary of something this monumental in our lives is a gift. Having the chance to appreciate it with our fans, families and fellow bandmates while we are all alive and kicking is an opportunity I can’t wait to embrace."
